meanings.sent1: The unsold items were still on the shelves.
meanings.sent2: The store had many unsold products at the end of the day.
meanings.sent3: The unsold cookies were sad they didn't find a home.
meanings.sent4: The unsold tickets whispered sadly in the box office.
meanings.sent5: The unsold flowers wilted in the shop, longing for a buyer.

meanings.sent1: The unsold inventory was taking up space in the warehouse.
meanings.sent2: Despite the sale, some items were still unsold.
meanings.sent3: The unsold cupcakes threw a party for themselves in the bakery.
meanings.sent4: The unsold books sat quietly on the shelves, waiting for readers.
meanings.sent5: The unsold paintings stared sadly from the gallery walls, unappreciated.
